definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: balsam-tree (v. Ar. bak0’un Dozy:ZMG 1869, 188 but Löw:No. 47; acc. to TA like jrjyr, an eruca, cf. Lane s. v.; perh. cf. baka0’a give little milk, of camel, i.e. drop, drip); pl. [[בְּכָ אִים]] 2Sa 5:23, 2Sa 5:24 = 1Ch 14:14; 1Ch 14:15; sg. in [[עֵמֶק הַבָּכָא]] Ps 84:7 balsam-vale, cf. De Che.
